headline: Dominion Energy (NYSE:D) Welcomes Jeffrey Lyash as New Independent Director
summary: Dominion Energy (NYSE:D) recently appointed Jeffrey J. Lyash as a new independent director, emphasizing its commitment to corporate governance and nuclear operations. This board refreshment aligns with the company’s strategic objectives, potentially adding weight to the overall market movements. Over the last week, the market saw an upward trend of 1.7%, and Dominion Energy's shares rose by 1.88%, suggesting that the appointment may have been positively received but generally tracked the...

headline: 3 No-Brainer Safe Dividend Stocks to Buy With $1,000 Right Now
summary: Dividends that get paid in good markets and bad can help you sleep well at night when the world is in turmoil.  There is one group of dividend stocks that provide a necessity for modern life, regardless of what is going on in the world.  Investors with $1,000 can invest in a stock offering dividend growth, a reliable income stream, and/or one that is turning its business around.
